articles.title: KPA Seizes S. Korean Ship
articles.content:
KPA Seizes S. Korean Ship
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A patrol ship of the Navy of the Korean People's Amy captured one ship of south Korea on July 30 when it illegally intruded deep into the DPRK territorial waters in the East Sea of Korea.
					 A relevant institution is conducting concrete investigation into it at present.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday to mark the 35th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work (August 2, 1974).
					In the work Kim Jong Il defined it as a prerequisite for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea, the general task of the party work, to model the whole party on the Juche idea and clarified all the principled matters including the issue of firmly building the ranks of the party and the revolution, the issue of strengthening the party guidance to the socialist economic construction and the issue of improving and strengthening the party work system and work method.
					
					Among those present at the meeting were senior party, army and state officials, leading officials and party officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions and party officials and persons of merits in Pyongyang.
					
					Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report at the meeting.
					
					The reporter said that in the work Kim Jong Il clarified a unique line on modeling the whole party on the Juche idea, thus successfully carrying out the historic task for the fulfillment of the programme for building a revolutionary party in order to accomplish the cause started by the leader, an issue raised by the era.
					
					He further said: The period since the advancement of the policy on modeling the whole party on the Juche idea represented a history of the sacred struggle in which the WPK has laid an eternal cornerstone for preserving and carrying forward and developing the revolutionary idea and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung in the party building and revolutionary leadership. This period is recorded as glorious decades in which the WPK has demonstrated the dignity and might of the country and the nation before the world and led the socialist cause of Juche to shining victory.
					
					Kim Jong Il has led the historic struggle to model the whole party on the Juche idea, thus bringing about a great revolutionary turn in building the WPK, the reporter said, and went on:.
					
					It was thanks to his experienced and tested guidance that the DPRK emerged a political, ideological and military power and, at the same time, a scientific and technological power, getting closer to the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					The WPK ushered in a new era of reunification in which the Koreans are advancing the national reunification movement, guided by the idea and will of "By our nation itself" under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, strikingly demonstrated the sovereignty and dignity of the country and boosted international solidarity with the Korean revolution.
					
					The reporter underscored the need for all the party members, servicepersons and other people to step up the drive for modeling the whole party on the Juche idea and thus glorify the WPK as the eternal party of the President, accelerate the building of a thriving nation and work hard to achieve the national reunification and the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					The golden days of national prosperity and the stirring era of creation and change are drawing closer and Juche Korea will have a rosy future with a thriving socialist nation expected to emerge before long, concluded the reporter.

articles.title: Greetings to Macedonian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Macedonian President
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Gjorgje  Ivanov, President of Macedonia, on Saturday on its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Macedonia would grow stronger in mutual interests.

articles.title: Greetings to Macedonian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Macedonian PM
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Nikola Gruevski, Prime Minister of Macedonia, on its national day.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Macedonia great successes in their work for the development of the country and the promotion of the people's welfare.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations arrived in Pyongyang by air on Saturday to take part in the Pyongyang International Architectural Book Exhibition.
					They were a delegation of the Architectural Society of China led by Vice-President He Jingtang, a delegation of the China National Publications Import and Export (Group) Corporation headed by Deputy General Manager Dai Zuofu, a delegation of the Association for Promotion of Development of Chinese Culture, a delegation of the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact of China, a delegation of the Shanghai Association for International Friendly Contact of China, a delegation of the Songhuajiang Commercial Ltd. Company of Jilin Province, China, a delegation of the Library of Yanbian University of China, a delegation of "Environmental Education Media Project", a delegation of the Pugwash Conference on Science and World Affairs and a delegation of the Association of Korean Scientists and Technicians in the U.S.
					
					Earlier, a delegation of Far-Eastern National University of Technology of Russia came here.
					
					Meanwhile, a delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Fujio Hanawa, secretary general of its National Liaison Council, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Reception Hosted to Mark Swiss National Day
articles.content:
Reception Hosted to Mark Swiss National Day
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Kathi Zellweger, country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK, hosted a reception Saturday on the national day of Switzerland.
					 Present there on invitation were officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Book "Among the People" Published
articles.content:
Book "Among the People" Published
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 82 of "Among the People", a collection of reminiscences, which tells about the devoted service and noble popular traits of President Kim Il Sung who had worked heart and soul for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					 Contained in the book are 20 reminiscences. Among them are reminiscences dealing with the moving stories that the President advanced the first five-year plan of the national economy at the Third Congress of the WPK and visited the Kangson Steel Works to kindle the revolutionary great surge in the hearts of workers there and that he gave instructions to remain more faithful to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There are also reminiscences telling about the facts that the President initiated the Northern Railway project and the construction of the Sodusu Power Station and energetically led the projects, strove to develop agricultural production and rapidly improve the living standard of peasants in mountainous areas and took warm care of people and children.
					
					 Carried in the book are reminiscences dealing with the facts that the President highly appreciated the patriotic deed done by an ordinary boy in a mountainous county and put him forward as Hero of the Republic before the era and people and gave deep trust to the discharged soldiers so that they could play a leading role in socialist construction as they did in the days of military service.

articles.title: Wormwood-Starch Noodle Served in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Wormwood-Starch Noodle Served in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Tongchonho Restaurant at the foot of picturesque Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang has recently developed nutritious and tasty starch noodle mixed with wormwood to delight the citizens in their 150-day campaign.
					 This news goes around among the citizens.
					
					 The restaurant has served starch noodle, bread and cooling beverage to those visiting the pleasure ground as main dishes.
					
					The starch noodle is a favorite traditional dish of the Korean people. But the starch is not high nutritive.
					
					In the course of striving to eliminate the defect of the starch noodle and increase its nutritive value and taste, its employees succeeded in making the wormwood-starch noodle.
					
					Wormwood growing everywhere in Korea not only contains all the nutritive elements which are poor in starch but also is of high medicinal value.
					
					The wormwood-starch noodle is not so tough, saltless and slippery as starch noodle but is very tasty.
					
					The color of the noodle gives fresh and mild feelings, adds taste to the cold noodle and stimulates the appetite.
					
					The light green color of the noodle is harmonized well with sliced raw fish and spices. 
					
					The wormwood-starch noodle, good to see and tasty, diversifies the dietary culture of the Korean people.

articles.title: Paternal Love for Water Sports Bases
articles.content:
Paternal Love for Water Sports Bases
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Well-furnished bases for water sports have been arranged in different parts of the DPRK.
					At the beach resorts and swimming and paddling pools furnished with modern sports facilities, the working people and school youth and children are deeply touched by the great love of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					Covering an energetic long journey of field guidance day and night in defiance of the midsummer heat, he has paid deep attention to the work for making the people enjoy swimming to their heart's content in summer days so as to have high pride of living in a maritime country. 
					
					Saying that everyone should swim as Korea is bounded on three sides by the seas, he saw to it that swimming and paddling resorts have been built in seas, rivers and lakes of the country and indicated detailed ways for their construction. 
					
					He also took measures to build lots of swimming pools in institutions, industrial establishments, schools and districts, too, noting that swimming should be encouraged throughout the country.
					
					While giving field guidance to the swimming complex newly built at Kim Il Sung University this year, he earnestly instructed officials that as swimming was good for health and physical training of the people, it should be encouraged extensively and students be given good swimming lessons to be good swimmers.
					
					Peculiar bathing resorts have been arranged in scenic spots on the seashore including Songdowon, Majon, Thongchon and Monggumpho and swimming and paddling pools built in different places of Pyongyang and local areas to provide the people with good conditions for their water sports.
					
					Vast beaches and reconstructed shower cubicles, diving boards and service facilities add pleasure to the people enjoying holidays.
					
					Having set July and August as months for water sports the government provides full conditions for physical culture and sports activities, with the result that the ranks of swimming addicts are ever increasing.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates a signed article to the 18th anniversary of the publication of the work of President Kim Il Sung "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation".
					 The work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies principles and ways for achieving the great unity of the entire nation, which is a prerequisite to national reunification and its essential contents, on the basis of a scientific analysis into the situation of the reunification movement early in the 1990s.
					
					 The article says that the work has powerfully encouraged all the Koreans in their sacred struggle for national unity and the reunification of the country for the last 18 years.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad have waged a vigorous struggle to shatter every desperate move of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad through national cooperation, actively realizing unity and organized alliance as required by the work and great landmark successes have been made in this course to be registered in the history of the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il has thoroughly carried out the last instruction of the President for national reunification. Thanks to his outstanding leadership and patriotic will there took place the historic Pyongyang summits which culminated in the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for its implementation. This ushered in a new era when Koreans are working hard to achieve the independent reunification of the country by their concerted efforts. This meant a shining victory of the idea and line of the President for achieving great national unity and a striking manifestation of their great vitality.
					
					 The historic work serves as an immortal banner for the Korean nation to invariably hold aloft in the nationwide struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the article notes, urging all Koreans to uphold the north-south joint declarations, programmes for independent reunification in the new century provided by Kim Jong Il, as a banner for winning sure victory, thoroughly defend them and forcefully propel their implementation.

articles.title: Truth about "Spyring Case" Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth about "Spyring Case" Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation on July 28 disclosed the truth about the "spyring case of persons of literature" cooked up during the "Yusin" dictatorship.
					 According to it, October of 1973 witnessed student demonstrations and one million-signature campaign of dissident figures across south Korea against the "Yusin constitution". And persons of literature issued a statement in support of them.
					
					 Much upset by this, the puppets set in motion the "Security Command" at that time to arrest the five persons of literature who signed the statement or contributed articles to a magazine published by a compatriot affiliated to the "south Korean Residents Association in Japan" on charge of "espionage" in a bid to weather a crisis.
					
					 The fascist elements threw them into custody without warrants for arrest and put them to unbearable torture, faking up a case and spreading it through media.
					
					 The above-said persons offered strong resistance, denying the case at a trial, but military dictators declared them guilty.
					
					 Disclosing these facts, the above-said committee stressed that it was the unilateral assertion of the investigation organ that they were "operatives of the north" but there was no evidence to support the claim. 
					
					 The committee urged the authorities to make an apology to the victims of the case and take measures to reinstate them.

articles.title: Anti-Reunification Remarks of GNP Gentries Flayed
articles.content:
Anti-Reunification Remarks of GNP Gentries Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea issued a statement on July 28 to denounce the group of the "Grand National Party" for its anti-reunification remarks.
					The statement recalled the organization carried an article titled "Let us bring about a 'peace agreement on the Korean Peninsula to get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea' by the efforts of all the people" in the newspaper Hangyore on July 27.
					
					As regards this, the group of the GNP let loose a spate of vituperation that the peace agreement asserted by the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification only represented the "north's stand" and that "preceding governments supported such people", it noted, adding that this is a typical anti-reunification offensive of the GNP. The above-said claim made by the GNP on the charge that their assertion was identical to the north's is nothing but a far-fetched assertion, it declared.
					
					The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification has worked hard to disclose the aggressive nature of the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" and demanded the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea through its independent activities, not blindly following other's assertions, it charged. 
					
					It urged the group of the GNP to own its responsibility for having defamed the honor of the organization with all sorts of vituperation and make an official apology for this. 
					
					If the group refuses to meet this demand, they will take legal and political countermeasures, it warned.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. and Anti-Japanese Struggle Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. and Anti-Japanese Struggle Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- More than 80 progressive organizations including the Federation of Homogeneous Nation Movement Organizations of south Korea held a meeting for making a history of national independence in Seoul on July 29 104 years after the fabrication of the "Taft-Katsura Agreement," a product of the criminal conspiracy between U.S. and Japanese aggressors. 
					 At the meeting, the speakers recalled that the U.S. and Japan held talks in camera 104 years ago at which the agreement which allows Japan to occupy Korea was signed.
					
					 The Koreans still remember that day in order to harden their resolution and will not to allow themselves to suffer the same insult and disregard by outside forces as they did in the past, they declared. 
					
					 They lashed out at Japan for getting evermore undisguised in its ambition to stage a comeback to Korea, far from making an apology for its crimes, though more than a century has passed since then. 
					
					 They called upon all Koreans in the south and the north and abroad to unite and achieve the country's reunification without fail, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 They underscored the need for them to preserve independence of the nation, not yielding to pressure and blackmail by any "big power."
					
					 They called upon all the compatriots to turn out in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the nation and foil Japan's moves to revive militarism.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to stop at once patronizing Japan and actions to invade other countries. 
					
					 Civic and public organizations said that they would declare the period till November 17, the day of the fabrication of "Ulsa Five-point Treaty", as a period of the movement for making a history of national independence and launch an anti-U.S. and anti-Japanese struggle.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's War Victory Marked in Pakistan and France
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's War Victory Marked in Pakistan and France
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Pakistan and France on July 21 and 22 to mark the 56th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Speeches were made at the seminars.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, said that the Korean people's victory in the war inspired the world people to national liberation struggle and, consequently, many more countries achieved their national independence.
					
					 The chairman of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan said that it was thanks to the keen perspicacity and wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung that the Korean people could defeat the U.S. imperialists in the war.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, urged the U.S. to draw due lesson from the defeat it suffered in Korea, saying that the Korean war gave the people a serious lesson that those who like aggression and war, violating justice and peace, would meet only death and defeat.
					
					 Messages of greetings to General Secretary Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Communist Party of Sweden issued a statement on July 24 on the same occasion.
					
					 The statement stressed that the Korean War proved that it is quite possible to fight and defeat imperialism even if it is very strong.
					
					 The Communist Party of Sweden strongly opposes the nuclear monopoly system of the imperialists posing nuclear threat and attack to those countries that do not bow to their power, it declared, urging the U.S. to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement as soon as possible.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Italian figures separately issued statements on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Kamal Hyder, secretary general of the Bangladesh Peace Council, in a statement on July 16 bitterly denounced the U.S. for staging madcap war exercises targeted against the DPRK, keeping tens of thousands of troops in south Korea.
					
					 He called upon the peace-loving people of the world to turn out in a vigorous struggle to foil all sorts of intervention and provocation of the U.S. in order to preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula and fully supported the just cause of the DPRK.
					
					 The international secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy in a statement on July 18 condemned the U.S. for threatening the DPRK militarily and aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula, instead of drawing lesson from its defeat in the last Korean War.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK are proving futile in face of the Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and the strong single-minded unity of the Korean people around their leader, he expressed conviction that the Korean people's cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation is sure to triumph thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He underscored the need for the political parties and peoples struggling for independence and progress to extend positive support to the Korean people who have made a great contribution to the global independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in More than 170 Countries for Last 15 Years
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in More than 170 Countries for Last 15 Years
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The last 15 years since July 8 of 1994 when President Kim Il Sung demised witnessed more than 6,000 events of various forms that have taken place in more than 170 countries to remember him.
					Shocked at the sad news that the President passed away all of a sudden, many heads of state, government and political parties and organizations of many countries and international and regional organizations and personages of all social standings sent messages of condolences over his demise. They numbered nearly 3,500. More than 3,300 wreaths were presented and countless number of foreigners paid condolatory visits to the DPRK missions abroad.
					
					 20 countries and international organizations set a period of mourning and hoisted flags at half mast. 
					
					 Mourning events and 100-day memorial services were took place in more than 160 countries amidst the concern of the governments, political parties and organizations. It was part of events to pay silent tribute to the President who was recognized as a world political elder before the start of any international conference and other meetings.
					
					 Committees for remembering the President were inaugurated every year in many countries including Pakistan, Ghana, Angola, Togo, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Democratic Congo, Guinea, Equatorial Guinea, Guyana and Peru. 
					
					 Ceremonies of unveiling statues of the President and displaying his portraits took place at various units of Nigeria, Pakistan and Mongolia with large attendance.
					
					 The heads of state and government and political party leaders and personages of all social standings of various countries including Guinea, Syria, Cambodia, Equatorial Guinea, Guyana and Bulgaria laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues and portraits of the President.
					
					 Chosica City of Peru awarded a gold medal and a diploma to the President in recognition of the undying contributions he made to global peace and independence while its Huaytara Province registered him as an honorary citizen.
					
					 Prominent figures of various countries and international and regional organizations in their statements and speeches made at press conferences highly praised the President as the greatest man in history and a world political elder who performed the most brilliant exploits in the annals of the 20th century.

articles.title: Lancha patrullera del EPC captura barco surcoreano
articles.content:
Lancha patrullera del EPC captura barco surcoreano
Pyongyang, 1 de agosto (ATCC) -- Una lancha patrullera de las fuerzas navales del Ejercito Popular de Corea capturo el 30 de julio un barco surcoreano que se ha infiltrado ilegalmente en lo profundo de las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte en el Mar Este.
					 Actualmente, el organo competente realiza la investigacion detallada del caso.

articles.title: Acto central por aniversario 35 de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por aniversario 35 de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 1 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el aniversario 35 de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il publicada el 2 de agosto de1974.
					En ese trabajo, el Dirigente definio la transformacion de todo el partido segun la idea Juche como la condicion previa de la misma empresa con toda la sociedad, meta general de las labores del partido, y presento los problemas de principios como el de formar bien a las filas de partido y la revolucion, el de fortalecer la direccion del partido sobre la construccion economica socialista y el de mejorar el sistema y el metodo de trabajo del partido.
					
					Al conclave asistieron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, los ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios del partido y benemeritos en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok.
					
					Al presentar en esa obra publicada hace 35 anos la original linea de transformar todo el partido segun la idea Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il cumplio satisfactoriamente la tarea historica -presentada por la epoca- sobre el programa de construccion de un partido revolucionario para llevar a feliz termino la causa del lider, comenzo Choe y continuo:
					
					Desde entonces hasta la fecha, el PTC libro la sagrada lucha por consolidar la eterna piedra angular necesaria para defender y desarrollar en la construccion del partido y la direccion sobre la revolucion la idea revolucionaria e inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Ademas, en esos anales orgullosos, el PTC vino manifestando a todo el mundo la dignidad y el impetu de la patria y la nacion y conduciendo a la fulminante victoria la causa socialista del Juche.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il organizo y dirigio la historica lucha por transformar todo el partido segun la idea Juche y trajo de esta manera un gran cambio revolucionario en la construccion del PTC.
					
					Gracias a su probada y diestra guia, la RPDC emergio hoy como potencia ideo-politica, militar y cientifico-tecnica y entro a pasos firmes en la entrada a la gran potencia prospera.
					
					El PTC dio inicio a la nueva era, en que el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria avanza en virtud de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y del ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Ademas, hizo mas fuertes la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y otros habitantes deben dar mas empujes a la empresa de transformar todo el partido segun la idea Juche, de modo que el PTC fuera siempre el del Presidente     Kim Il Sung.
					
					Igualmente, deben luchar tenazmente por construir lo mas pronto posible una gran potencia prospera y alcanzar la reunificacion de la patria y la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					En nuestro camino por delante se va abriendo la era de prosperidad de la patria y el tiempo de grandes creaciones y cambios y es maravilloso el futuro de la Corea del Juche donde sera edificada en un futuro cercano una gran potencia prospera socialista.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegaciones de varios paises a exhibicion de libros
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegaciones de varios paises a exhibicion de libros
Pyongyang, 1 de agosto (ATCC) -- Llegaron este sabado a esta capital por via aerea la delegacion de la Sociedad de Arquitectos Chinos presidida por su vicepresidente He Jingtang, la de la Corporacion Nacional de Importacion y Exportacion de Libros de China (grupo) dirigida por su subgerente general Dai Zuofu, la de la Sociedad para la Promocion de Desarrollo de Cultura de China, las de la Asociacion de Enlace de Amistad Internacional de la provincia de Liaoning y de Shanghai, la de la Compania Limitada de Comercio Songhuajiang de la Provincia de Jilin, de China, la de la Biblioteca de la Universidad de Yanbian, la de "Proyecto de Divulgacion de Educacion Medioambiental", la del Conferencia sobre la Ciencia y Asuntos Mundiales Pugwash y la de la Asociacion de Cientificos y Tecnicos Coreanos en Estados Unidos para participar en la Exhibicion Internacional de Libros Arquitectonicos de Pyongyang.
					Con anterioridad, arribo la delegacion de la Universidad Tecnica Estatal del Lejano Oriente de Rusia.
					
					Por otra parte, llego el mismo dia la delegacion de la Sociedad de Estudio de la idea Juche de Japon encabezada por el secretario general del Consejo Nacional de Enlace Fujio Hanawa.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora dia de publicacion de obra de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora dia de publicacion de obra de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 1 de agosto (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion de este sabado un articulo individual dedicado al 18o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Alcancemos la gran unidad de nuestra nacion".
					Esta obra, publicada el dia primero de agosto del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche, presenta los principios y remedios para lograr la gran unidad pannacional, que constituye la premisa fundamental y lo esencial de la reunificacion de la patria, basandose en el analisis cientifico del movimiento por la reunificacion a principios de la decada de 1990.
					
					A lo largo de los 18 anos pasados, la obra estimulo energicamente a toda la nacion a la sagrada lucha por la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria, senala el articulista y continua:
					
					Como lo indicado en esa obra, todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar han librado la dinamica lucha alcanzando la unidad y la alianza y frustrando con el poderio de cooperacion nacional las brutales maniobras de las fuerzas internas y externas oponentes a la reunificacion. En ese curso, registraron en la historia nacional grandes exitos. 
					
					Gracias a la destacada orientacion y la voluntad patriotica del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien materializa consecuentemente el legado del Presidente en materia de la reunificacion de la patria, se celebraron los historicos encuentros-cumbre Norte-Sur en Pyongyang, en los cuales fueron aprobadas la Declaracion Conjunta N-S del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera.
					
					De esta manera, se dio inicio a la nueva era en que la nacion coreana lucha por lograr la reunificacion independiente con sus propias fuerzas unidas. 
					
					Estos exitos son brillante triunfo de la idea y la linea del Presidente acerca de la gran unidad nacional y manifiestan inagotable vitalidad de ellas.
					
					La historica obra del Presidente deviene la inmortal bandera que toda la nacion coreana debe enarbolar siempre en su gigantesca lucha por la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria. 
					
					Todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana deben considerar como bandera de victorias las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, programas preparados por el Dirigente para impulsar esa causa en el nuevo siglo, defenderlas y fomentar su implementacion.
